description: Provide bar patrons with superior service and enjoyable, memorable experience with excelled up-selling customers from shelf to premium brands.

majorprojects.name: Interactive Menu Web App
majorprojects.description: As my first real world experience-I contacted my old job Sushi Junai-a popular all you can eat sushi joint in Austin TX-and offered them to create a web application. Under my lead, with 4 other classmates, we developed a customized Sushi Junai app with a order track with an option to save favorites! The app is in 3rd iteration and more updates are still coming.
majorprojects.tools: React.JS, Redux, Node.JS, MySQL, Yelp API, Reactstrap, Sequelize, Heroku

majorprojects.name: Interactive Music Review Platform
majorprojects.description: A site that allows users to search, catalogue, and review music on an individual page, curating their tastes and watching trends emerge in real time.
majorprojects.tools: Node.js, Express, Spotify API, jQuery, Sequelize, jawsDB, Foundation, Heroku
